form.h3: خاندان رجسٹریشن فارم - Family Registration Form

label.span: Shehr: ; Town: ; UC: ; Center ka naam:

legend.span: Gharane kay sarabarah ka pehlay kisi Thrive kay Progam may indraj hay
Household head already enrolled in any other Thrive program

label.span: Maximum 20 digits and cannot contain anything other than number
Mandarja ID darj bala ID say mukhtalif nahi hosakti
Does not match with value entered above
Program Client ID dobara darj karen
Naam 3-30 huroof par mushtamil hona chahyay kisi makhsoo harf ki bagahir. Iskay ilawa sirf [. - space] hosaktay hen
Name should contain only 3-30 alphabets and no special characters. Only allowed [. - space]
Umr 10-160 saal kay darmiyan honi chahyay
Umr 10-160 saal kay darmiyan honi chahyay
Phone number 11 hindason par mushtamil aur mundarja zail shakal main hona chahiey: 03*********
Phone number should be 11 digits in the following format: 03*********
Gharaane kay afraad ki taadaad (bashamool sarbarah)
Number of members in household (including head)

option.data-items-path: instance('ucs')/root/item[(province= /family_registration_form/household/province and city= /family_registration_form/household/city_village and town= /family_registration_form/household/town ) or town='na']

label.span: Hasil karda malomaat ki jaga ke GPS coordinates darj karain
Collect GPS coordinates of data entry location
GPS coordinates can only be collected when outside.
